metadata.titleEn: Early Cretaceous volcanic rock data set in northern North China
metadata.titleCn: 华北北部早白垩世火山岩数据集
metadata.description: The data include major elements, trace elements and Sr – nd Pb isotopic data. In 2018, samples were collected from the early Cretaceous Chaoyang and Beipiao volcanic rocks in the northern North China Craton. The whole rock major geochemical data were obtained by rigaku-zsx-100e X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF). The whole rock trace geochemical data were obtained by Perkin Elmer Elan 6000 inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS). The whole rock SR – nd Pb isotopic compositions were obtained by sample separation and purification and multi receiver inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS). The data obtained can reveal the contribution of mantle and crustal melt to basic to intermediate acid volcanic rocks, and evaluate the importance of mantle derived magma underplating to the formation and evolution of continental crust in post collisional environment.
metadata.descriptionCn: 数据包含火山岩的全岩主量元素、微量元素和全岩Sr–Nd-Pb同位素数据。2018年样品采集华北克拉通北部早白垩世朝阳和北票火山岩。岩石全岩主量地球化学数据是Rigaku-ZSX-100e型X射线荧光光谱仪（XRF）获得的。全岩微量地球化学数据是通过Perkin Elmer ELAN 6000电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS）获得的。岩石全岩Sr–Nd-Pb同位素是通过样品分离提纯-多接收电感耦合等离子体质谱仪分析获得的。通过获得的数据，可以揭示地幔和地壳熔体对基性到中酸性火山岩的贡献，评估地幔源岩浆底侵在碰撞后环境中对大陆地壳的形成和演化的重要性。
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file. The file name "wrmt. Xlsx" represents the whole rock master and trace data. The file name "wriso. Xlsx" represents the whole rock isotopic geochemical data.
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储。文件名称为“WRMT.xlsx”代表全岩主微量数据。文件名称为“WRIso.xlsx”代表全岩同位素地球化学数据。

authorList.unitCn: 中国科学院广州地球化学研究所

literatureList.titleEn: Petrological and Geochemical Constraints on the Origin of Early Cretaceous Volcanic Rocks in the Central-East Asia: Implications for Crustal Growth and Evolution
literatureList.referenceEn: Qian, S.P., Ren, Z.Y., Zhang, L., Zhang, L., Wu, Y.D., Mei, S.W., Xu, X.B., & Luo, Q.C. (2018). Petrological and Geochemical Constraints on the Origin of Early Cretaceous Volcanic Rocks in the Central‐East Asia: Implications for Crustal Growth and Evolution. Geochemistry, Geophysics, Geosystems, 19(9), 3004-3018.

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features and techniques involved in collecting geochemical and isotopic data from early Cretaceous volcanic rocks in Northern North China?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在北中国早白垩纪火山岩中收集地球化学和同位素数据的具体特征和技术包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: whole-rock major element geochemical data, Rigaku-ZSX-100e X-ray fluorescence spectrometer, whole-rock trace element geochemical data, Perkin Elmer ELAN 6000 inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer, whole-rock Sr–Nd-Pb isotopic data, multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩主元素地球化学数据，Rigaku-ZSX-100e X射线荧光光谱仪，全岩微量元素地球化学数据，Perkin Elmer ELAN 6000电感耦合等离子体质谱仪，全岩Sr-Nd-Pb同位素数据，多接收电感耦合等离子体质谱仪。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many samples were collected from the Northern North China Craton region for the Early Cretaceous volcanic rocks?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在早白垩世火山岩的研究中，北方华北克拉通地区共收集了多少样本？
Quantification.AnswerEn: The original answer does not provide a specific numerical value for the number of samples collected. Therefore, there is no quantifiable information to extract or refine.
Quantification.AnswerCn: 原始答案没有提供具体的样本数量。因此，没有可提取或细化的量化信息。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of X-ray fluorescence spectrometry, inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry, and multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry enhance the interpretation of volcanic rock geochemistry and isotope data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: X射线荧光光谱法、感应耦合等离子体质谱法和多收集器感应耦合等离子体质谱法的结合可以增强火山岩地球化学和同位素数据的解释。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of X-ray fluorescence spectrometry provides comprehensive major element geochemical data, while inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry offers detailed trace element analysis. Multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry allows for precise isotope measurements. Together, these methods enable a detailed understanding of mantle and crustal contributions to volcanic rock composition, and help assess the significance of mantle-derived magma underplating in post-collisional continental crust formation and evolution.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: X射线荧光光谱法提供了全面的主要元素地球化学数据，而感应耦合等离子体质谱法则提供详细的微量元素分析。多收集器感应耦合等离子体质谱法允许进行精确的同位素测量。这些方法结合在一起，使我们能够详细了解火山岩成分中地幔和地壳的贡献，并帮助评估地幔源岩浆下侵在后碰撞大陆地壳形成和演化中的重要性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes might contribute to variations or inaccuracies in geochemical data collection methods, particularly when analyzing early Cretaceous volcanic rocks in North China?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致地球化学数据收集方法中出现变异或不准确的原因可能包括：特别是在分析中国北方早白垩纪火山岩时。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Variations or inaccuracies in geochemical data collection methods could be attributed to several factors, including the precision and calibration of the instruments used, such as the Rigaku-ZSX-100e X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF) and the Perkin Elmer ELAN 6000 inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (ICP-MS). Additionally, the sample preparation process, the condition and preservation of the volcanic rock samples collected from North China, and potential human error during sample handling and analysis could also contribute to these variations.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 地球化学数据采集方法的变异或不准确性可能归因于多个因素，包括所使用仪器的精度和校准，例如Rigaku-ZSX-100e X射线荧光光谱仪（XRF）和Perkin Elmer ELAN 6000感应耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS）。此外，样品准备过程、从华北收集的火山岩样品的状态和保存情况，以及在样品处理和分析过程中可能出现的人为错误也可能导致这些变异。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of collecting volcanic rock data such as whole-rock major elements, trace elements, and isotope data from the Early Cretaceous volcanic rocks in northern North China?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集来自北中国早白垩世火山岩的整体岩石主要元素、微量元素和同位素数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective of collecting volcanic rock data, including whole-rock major elements, trace elements, and isotope data, is to reveal the contributions of mantle and crustal melts to the formation of basic to intermediate-acidic volcanic rocks and to evaluate the significance of mantle-derived magmatic underplating in the formation and evolution of continental crust in a post-collisional setting.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集火山岩数据（包括整体岩石主要元素、微量元素和同位素数据）的主要目的是揭示地幔和地壳熔融物对基性到中酸性火山岩形成的贡献，并评估在后碰撞环境中，地幔源熔融物的下伏对大陆地壳形成和演化的重要性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are employed to ensure the accuracy and reliability of geochemical data when using X-ray fluorescence (XRF) and inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) for analyzing volcanic rock samples?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在使用X射线荧光（XRF）和电感耦合等离子体质谱（ICP-MS）分析火山岩样品时，采用哪些程序来确保地球化学数据的准确性和可靠性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the field mentioned, geochemical data for volcanic rock samples are obtained using a Rigaku-ZSX-100e X-ray fluorescence spectrometer (XRF) for whole-rock major elements and a Perkin Elmer ELAN 6000 inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (ICP-MS) for whole-rock trace elements. Ensuring accuracy and reliability involves meticulous sample preparation, calibration against known standards, and possibly repeated measurements to account for instrument variability.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在提到的领域中，火山岩样品的地球化学数据是使用Rigaku-ZSX-100e X射线荧光光谱仪（XRF）获得的，用于整体岩石的主要元素分析，以及使用Perkin Elmer ELAN 6000感应耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS）获得的整体岩石的微量元素分析。确保准确性和可靠性涉及细致的样品准备、与已知标准的校准，以及可能的重复测量以考虑仪器的变异性。
